item.title: This Hog Hunt Did Not Go as Planned!
item.description: An unexpected twist turns a routine hog hunt into a challenging adventure—see how the day unfolds when plans go off track.

media:content.media:description: An unexpected twist turns a routine hog hunt into a challenging adventure—see how the day unfolds when plans go off track.

item.title: Off to bowfish
item.description: Heading out for a bowfishing trip—gear ready, boat loaded, and aiming for an exciting day on the water.

item.title: Fixing Driveway Flooding with a Box Blade
item.description: Watch as a box blade is put to work reshaping the driveway to improve drainage and solve persistent flooding issues.

item.title: Solving the #1 Problem Tractor Owners Face
item.description: A simple yet effective fix tackles the most common headache for tractor owners—saving time, money, and frustration in the long run.

item.title: Emergency in the Skid Steer
item.description: A sudden problem strikes mid-operation—see how quick thinking and fast action handle this skid steer emergency.

item.title: This Is Our Goodbye. I’m Sorry.
item.description: A heartfelt farewell message, reflecting on what’s happened and expressing sincere apologies before parting ways.

item.title: The Part That Fails Again and Again
item.description: Discover the component known for frequent breakdowns—why it happens and how to prevent costly repeat failures.

item.title: I Sold Him a Tractor… Then This Happened!
item.description: What started as a simple sale took an unexpected turn—find out what happened after the tractor changed hands.

item.title: Will it start? CAT Model 12 Road grader
item.description: This CAT Model 12 road grader has been idle too long—watch the diagnostic process and the engine start attempt to see if it comes back to life.

item.title: Will it start? Motor Grader
item.description: An old motor grader sits silent—can it be brought back to life? Watch as we attempt to fire up the engine and tackle this challenge.

item.title: Will it start? Broken heavy equipment
item.description: A worn-down machine faces a fresh chance—watch as efforts are made to rev it up and get this heavy equipment running again.

item.title: Fishing a tiny creek!
item.description: Exploring the peaceful charm of a small creek—see what bites in these hidden waters.

item.title: Will It Start? Logging Machine
item.description: A seasoned logging machine faces the ultimate test—can it still roar to life after years of downtime?watch the engine revival and the surprises along the way.

item.title: Having Fun Aiming for the Target
item.description: A light‑hearted session of skill and focus—see the fun in trying to hit the mark without missing a shot.

item.title: Reolink trackmix
item.description: Monitor every detail with Reolink TrackMix—featuring dual lenses, 6× hybrid zoom, and auto‑tracking for clear, reliable coverage day or night.

item.title: Bighorn 550 Explorer oil change/air filter change
item.description: Follow along as we perform an oil change and air filter replacement to keep the Bighorn 550 Explorer running smoothly.

item.title: Tannerite is fun!
item.description: See the excitement of using Tannerite for target shooting—handled responsibly for a safe and thrilling experience.

item.title: Testing the New Zulus V2 Scope from DNZ Optics
item.description: Hamiltonville Farm tries out the Zulus V2 from @dntoptics—sharing first impressions, mounting tips, and how this new scope performs in the field.

item.description: My EDC minimalist front pocket wallet. #takeitoutside #proofwallets

item.title: Will This 30-Year-Old Military Backhoe Start?
item.description: Hamiltonville Farm checks out an abandoned military surplus backhoe that’s been sitting for decades. Can they get this tough old machine to crank back to life?
